verses.verse: And <WG2532> Having Come To Him <WG4334> The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> Sadducees <WG4523> Tempting Him <WG3985> Asked <WG1905> Him <WG846> A Sign <WG4592> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Heaven <WG3772> To Shew <WG1925> Them. <WG846>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Answering <WG611> Said <WG2036> To Them, <WG846> Evening <WG3798> Having Come <WG1096>, Ye Say, <WG3004>, Fine Weather; <WG2105> <WG4449> For Is Red <WG1063> The <WG3588> Heaven. <WG3772>

And <WG2532> At Morning, <WG4404> Today <WG4594>, A Storm; <WG5494> <WG4449> For Is Red <WG1063> Lowering <WG4768> The <WG3588> Heaven. <WG3772>, Hypocrites! <WG5273> The <WG3588> Indeed <WG3303> Face <WG4383> Of The <WG3588> Heaven <WG3772> Ye Know How <WG1097>, To Discern, <WG1252> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Signs <WG4592> Of The <WG3588> Times <WG2540> <WG3756> Ye Cannot! <WG1410>

A Generation <WG1074> Wicked <WG4190> And <WG2532> Adulterous <WG3428> A Sign <WG4592> Seeks, <WG1934> And <WG2532> A Sign <WG4592> <WG3756> Shall Not Be Given <WG1325> To It, <WG846> <WG1487> Except <WG3361> The <WG3588> Sign <WG4592> Of Jonah <WG2495> The <WG3588> Prophet. <WG4396> And <WG2532> Leaving <WG2641> Them <WG846> He Went Away. <WG565>
And <WG2532> Having Come <WG2064> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples <WG846> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Other Side <WG4008> They Forgot <WG1950> Loaves <WG740> To Take. <WG2983>

<WG3588> And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> To Them, <WG846> See <WG3708> And <WG2532> Beware <WG4337> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Leaven <WG2219> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> Sadducees. <WG4523>
<WG3588> And They <WG1161> Reasoned <WG1260> Among <WG1722> Themselves, <WG1438> Saying, <WG3004> Because <WG3754> Loaves <WG740> Not <WG3756> We Took. <WG2983>

<WG1097> And Having Known This <WG1161> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036>, To Them, <WG846> Why <WG5101> Reason Ye <WG1260> Among <WG1722> Yourselves, <WG1438> O Ye Of Little Faith, <WG3640> Because <WG3754> Loaves <WG740> Not <WG3756> Ye Took? <WG2983>

<WG3768> Do Ye Not Perceive, <WG3539> Nor <WG3761> Remember <WG3421> The <WG3588> Five <WG4002> Loaves <WG740> Of The <WG3588> Five Thousand, <WG4000> And <WG2532> How Many <WG4214> Hand Baskets <WG2894> Ye Took Up? <WG2983>
Nor <WG3761> The <WG3588> Seven <WG2033> Loaves <WG740> Of The <WG3588> Four Thousand, <WG5070> And <WG2532> How Many <WG4214> Baskets <WG4711> Ye Took Up? <WG2983>

How <WG4459> <WG3756> Perceive Ye Not <WG3539> That <WG3754> Not <WG3756> Concerning <WG4012> Bread <WG740> I Spoke <WG2036> To You <WG5213> To Beware <WG4337> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Leaven <WG2219> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> Sadducees? <WG4523>

Then <WG5119> They Understood <WG4920> That <WG3754> <WG3756> He Said Not <WG2036> To Beware <WG4337> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Leaven <WG2219> <WG3588>, Of Bread, <WG740> ' But <WG235> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1322> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> Sadducees. <WG4523>

<WG2064> And Having Come <WG1161> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Parts <WG3313> Of Caesarea <WG2542> <WG3588> Philippi <WG5376> He Questioned <WG2065> <WG3588> <WG3101> His Disciples, <WG846>, Saying, <WG3004> Whom <WG5101> Me <WG3165> Do Pronounce <WG3004> <WG3588> Men <WG444> To Be <WG1511> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man? <WG444>

<WG3588> And They <WG1161>, Said, <WG2036> <WG3588> Some <WG3303> John <WG2491> The <WG3588>, Baptist; <WG910> <WG243> And Others <WG1161>, Elijah; <WG2243> <WG2087> And Others <WG1161>, Jeremiah, <WG2408> Or <WG2228> One <WG1520> Of The <WG3588> Prophets. <WG4396>
He Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> <WG5210> But Ye <WG1161> Whom <WG5101> Me <WG3165> Do Ye Pronounce <WG3004> To Be? <WG1511>

<WG611> And Answering <WG1161> Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> Said, <WG2036> Thou <WG4771> Art <WG1488> The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> The <WG3588> Living. <WG2198>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> Blessed <WG3107> Art Thou, <WG1488> Simon <WG4613> <WG920> Bar - Jonah, <WG920> <WG2495>, For <WG3754> Flesh <WG4561> And <WG2532> Blood <WG129> <WG3756> Revealed It Not <WG601> To Thee, <WG4671> ' But <WG235> <WG3588> <WG3962> My Father <WG3450> Who Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Heavens. <WG3772>

<WG2504> And I Also <WG1161> To Thee <WG4671> Say, <WG3004> That <WG3754> Thou <WG4771> Art <WG1488> Peter, <WG4074> And <WG2532> On <WG1909> This <WG3778> <WG3588> Rock <WG4073> I Will Build <WG3618> My <WG3450> <WG3588> Assembly, <WG1577> And <WG2532> Gates <WG4439> Of Hades <WG86> <WG3756> Shall Not Prevail Against <WG2729> It. <WG846>

And <WG2532> I Will Give <WG1325> To Thee <WG4671> The <WG3588> Keys <WG2807> Of The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> Of The <WG3588> Heavens : <WG3772> And <WG2532> <WG3739> Whatever <WG1437> Thou Mayest Bind <WG1210> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth, <WG1093> Shall Be <WG2071> Bound <WG1210> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Heavens; <WG3772> And <WG2532> <WG3739> Whatever <WG1437> Thou Mayest Loose <WG3089> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth, <WG1093> Shall Be <WG2071> Loosed <WG3089> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Heavens. <WG3772>

Then <WG5119> Charged He <WG1291> <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> His <WG846> That <WG2443> To No One <WG3367> They Should Say <WG2036> That <WG3754> He <WG846> Is <WG2076> Jesus <WG2424> The <WG3588> Christ. <WG5547>

From <WG575> That Time <WG5119> Began <WG756> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> To Shew <WG1166> <WG3588> To Disciples <WG3101> His <WG846> That <WG3754> It Is Necessary For <WG1163> Him <WG846> To Go Away <WG565> To <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2414> And <WG2532> Many Things <WG4183> To Suffer <WG3958> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Elders <WG4245> And <WG2532> Chief Priests <WG749> And <WG2532> Scribes, <WG1122> And <WG2532> To Be Killed, <WG615> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Third <WG5154> Day <WG2250> To Be Raised. <WG1453>

And <WG2532> Having Taken To Him <WG4355> Him <WG846> <WG3588> Peter <WG4074> Began <WG756> To Rebuke <WG2008> Him, <WG846>, Saying, God Be <WG3004> Favourable <WG2436> To Thee, <WG4671> Lord : <WG2962> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> Shall Be <WG2071> To Thee <WG4671> This. <WG5124>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Having Turned <WG4762> Said <WG2036> <WG3588> To Peter, <WG4074> Get <WG5217> Behind <WG3694> Me, <WG3450> Satan : <WG4567> An Offence <WG4625>, To Me <WG3450> Thou Art, <WG1488> For <WG3754> <WG3756> Thy Thoughts Are Not Of <WG5426> The Things <WG3588> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> But <WG235> The Things <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Men. <WG444>

Then <WG5119> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Said <WG2036> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples, <WG846> If <WG1487> Any One <WG5100> Desires <WG2309> After <WG3694> Me <WG3450> To Come, <WG2064> Let Him Deny <WG533> Himself, <WG1438> And <WG2532> Let Him Take Up <WG142> <WG3588> <WG4716> His Cross, <WG846> And <WG2532> Let Him Follow <WG190> Me. <WG3427>

<WG3739> <WG1063> For Whoever <WG302> May Desire <WG2309> <WG3588> <WG5590> His Life <WG846> To Save, <WG4982> Shall Lose <WG622> It; <WG846> <WG3739> ' <WG1161> But Whoever <WG302> May Lose <WG622> <WG3588> <WG5590> His Life <WG846> On Account Of <WG1752> Me, <WG1700> Shall Find <WG2147> It. <WG846>

<WG5101> For What <WG1063> Is Profited <WG5623> A Man, <WG444> If <WG1437> The <WG3588> World <WG2889> Whole <WG3650> <WG2770> <WG3588> He Gain, <WG1161> <WG5590> And His Soul <WG846> Lose? <WG2210> Or <WG2228> What <WG5101> Will Give <WG1325> A Man As <WG444> An Exchange For <WG465> <WG3588> <WG5590> His Soul? <WG846>

<WG3195> For Is About <WG1063> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man <WG444> To Come <WG2064> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> <WG3588> Father <WG3962> Of His <WG846> With <WG3326> <WG3588> <WG32> His Angels; <WG846> And <WG2532> Then <WG5119> He Will Render <WG591> To Each <WG1538> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG4234> His Doing. <WG846>

Verily <WG281> I Say <WG3004> To You, <WG5213> There Are <WG1526> Some <WG5100> Of Those <WG3588> Here <WG5602>, Standing <WG2476> Who <WG3748> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> Shall Taste <WG1089> Of Death <WG2288> <WG2193> Until <WG302> They Have Seen <WG1492> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man <WG444> Coming <WG2064> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG932> His Kingdom. <WG846>
